column5: Knee lake resort is offering to guests a chance to catch tagged fish worth cash and fishing packages worth $50,000.100 fish will be tagged and released next spring.Only the tenth fish caught in the contest is worth the million.I think your chances are pretty slim considering how big this lake is.Knee lake is 650 km north of Winnipeg.

Chances are very slim at best of anyone getting that $1 million doller fish, but It sure would be nice to be the guide if it does happen.With the combined publicity from Oprah, these guys will be in pretty good shape this year, not that they aren't already.
